title: Science-Integrated Advanced Mathematics Concept Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: For current working professionals (administrative/managerial), advanced learning linking mathematical thinking with scientific inquiry methods.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the historical development of mathematical concepts using question-based learning strategies.
Learners can compare mathematical problems presented in diverse contexts (Pure Science/History of Science) and select optimal learning approaches.
Learners can creatively derive real-world applications of mathematical concepts by applying scientific inquiry skills.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
